controllers

Class ReimbursementController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.ReimbursementController

  • public class ReimbursementController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class for all the reimbursement related methods

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ReimbursementController(EmployeeController employeeController, ManagerController managerController) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createReimbursement(io.javalin.http.Context ctx)
      Makes a new reimbursement and adds it to the Mongo database
      void getEmployeeReimbursements(io.javalin.http.Context ctx)
      Grabs a list of all the reimbursements for a certain employee in the context of an employee wishing to see their reimbursements
      void managerGetAllReimbursements(io.javalin.http.Context ctx)
      Grabs the list of all reimbursements
      void managerGetEmployeeReimbursements(io.javalin.http.Context ctx)
      Grabs a list of all the reimbursements for a certain employee in the context of a manager wishing to see all reimbursements related to a particular employee
      void updateReimbursement(io.javalin.http.Context ctx)
      Updates a reimbursement to be either approved or denied by a certain manager
      void updateReimbursementAll(io.javalin.http.Context ctx)
      Updates a reimbursement to be either approved or denied by a certain manager
